name: AddTicketNote
description:
Add a new note to a Freshservice ticket.

Use this tool to post a new note on a specific Freshservice ticket by providing the ticket ID. This is useful for updating ticket information, providing status updates, or adding additional details related to the ticket.

parameters.name: ticket_id_to_add_note
parameters.description: The ID of the Freshservice ticket to which the note will be added. This ID is required to specify the particular ticket to update.

value_schema.description: ID of the ticket for which note has to be added

parameters.name: note_details
parameters.description: Details of the note to be posted, including user ID, privacy settings, body content, and attachments.

user_id.description: Unique ID of the user who created the note

private.description: Set to true if the note is private. The default value is true.

incoming.description: Set to true if the note should appear as being created from the outside (i.e., not through the web portal)

notify_emails.description: Addresses to which the note must be notified to

body.description: The body of the note in HTML format

body_text.description: The body of the note in plain text format

created_at.description: Date time at which the note was created

updated_at.description: Date time at which the note was updated

value_schema.description: details of the note to be posted
